verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye this, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, which are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and are come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add but\add* not in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, nor in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

For they \w call|strong="H7121"\w* themselves of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w stay|strong="H5564"\w* themselves upon the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

I have \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* the former \w things|strong="H7223"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H0227"\w*; and they went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and I \w shewed|strong="H8085"\w* them; I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*, and they came to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*.

Because I \w knew|strong="H1847"\w* that thou \add art\add* \w obstinate|strong="H7186"\w*, and thy \w neck|strong="H6203"\w* \add is\add* an \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w sinew|strong="H1517"\w*, and thy \w brow|strong="H4696"\w* \w brass|strong="H5154"\w*;\f + \fr 48.4 \ft obstinate: Heb. hard\f*

I have even from the \w beginning|strong="H0227"\w* \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* to thee; before it came to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* I \w shewed|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add* thee: lest thou shouldest \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Mine \w idol|strong="H6090"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* them, and my graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and my molten \w image|strong="H5262"\w*, hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them.

Thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w see|strong="H2372"\w* all this; and will not ye \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add*? I have \w shewed|strong="H8085"\w* thee new \w things|strong="H2319"\w* from this \w time|strong="H6258"\w*, even hidden \w things|strong="H5341"\w*, and thou didst not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* them.

They are \w created|strong="H1254"\w* now, and not from the beginning; even \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* them not; lest thou shouldest \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* them.

Yea, thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* not; yea, thou \w knewest|strong="H3045"\w* not; yea, from that time \add that\add* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* was not \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*: for I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that thou wouldest deal \w very|strong="H0898"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, and wast \w called|strong="H7121"\w* a \w transgressor|strong="H6586"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*.

¶ For my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake will I \w defer|strong="H0748"\w* mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and for my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* will I \w refrain|strong="H2413"\w* for thee, that I cut thee not \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

Behold, I have \w refined|strong="H6884"\w* thee, but not with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee in the \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*.\f + \fr 48.10 \ft with…: or, for silver\f*

For mine own sake, \add even\add* for mine own sake, will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* for how should \add my name\add* be \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w*? and I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* unto \w another|strong="H0312"\w*.

¶ \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, my \w called|strong="H7121"\w*; I \add am\add* he; I \add am\add* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, I also \add am\add* the \w last|strong="H0314"\w*.

Mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* also hath laid the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and my right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* hath \w spanned|strong="H2946"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: \add when\add* I \w call|strong="H7121"\w* unto them, they stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.\f + \fr 48.13 \ft my…: or, the palm of my right hand hath spread out\f*

All ye, \w assemble|strong="H6908"\w* yourselves, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; which among them hath \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* these \add things\add*? The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* him: he will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* on \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \add shall be on\add* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

I, \add even\add* I, have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*; yea, I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him: I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him, and he shall make his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w*.

¶ \w Come|strong="H7126"\w* ye \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto me, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye this; I have not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*; from the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that it was, there \add am\add* I: and now the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, and his \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which \w teacheth|strong="H3925"\w* thee to \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*, which \w leadeth|strong="H1869"\w* thee by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that\add* thou shouldest \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

O \w that|strong="H3863"\w* thou hadst \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w* to my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*! then had thy \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* been as a \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, and thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* as the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*:

Thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* also had been as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*, and the \w offspring|strong="H6631"\w* of thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* like the \w gravel|strong="H4579"\w* thereof; his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* should not have been cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* nor \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.

¶ Go ye \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* ye from the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, with a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w singing|strong="H7440"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye, \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* this, \w utter|strong="H3318"\w* it \add even\add* to the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

And they \w thirsted|strong="H6770"\w* not \add when\add* he \w led|strong="H3212"\w* them through the \w deserts|strong="H2723"\w*: he caused the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* to \w flow|strong="H5140"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* for them: he \w clave|strong="H1234"\w* the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* also, and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* gushed \w out|strong="H2100"\w*.
\add There is\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
